ps3.2:1.3: Iddhiya kati bhumiyo, kati pada, kati padani, kati mulani?
ps3.2:1.9: Iddhiya catasso bhumiyo, cattaro pada, attha padani, solasa mulani.
ps3.2:2.2: Adhitthana iddhi, vikubbana iddhi, manomaya iddhi, nanavipphara iddhi, samadhivipphara iddhi, ariya iddhi, kammavipakaja iddhi, punnavato iddhi, vijjamaya iddhi, tattha tattha sammapayogapaccaya ijjhanatthena iddhi.
ps3.2:3.2: Vivekajabhumi pathamam jhanam, pitisukhabhumi dutiyam jhanam, upekkhasukhabhumi tatiyam jhanam, adukkhamasukhabhumi catuttham jhanam.
ps3.2:3.3: Iddhiya ima catasso bhumiyo iddhilabhaya iddhipatilabhaya iddhivikubbanataya iddhivisavitaya iddhivasibhavaya iddhivesarajjaya samvattantiti.
ps3.2:4.2: Idha bhikkhu chandasamadhipadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti, cittasamadhipadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti, viriyasamadhipadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti, vimamsasamadhipadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti.
ps3.2:4.3: Iddhiya ime cattaro pada iddhilabhaya iddhipatilabhaya iddhivikubbanataya iddhivisavitaya iddhivasibhavaya iddhivesarajjaya samvattantiti.
ps3.2:5.2: Chandance bhikkhu nissaya labhati samadhim, labhati cittassa ekaggatam.
ps3.2:5.3: Chando na samadhi, samadhi na chando.
ps3.2:5.5: Viriyance bhikkhu nissaya labhati samadhim, labhati cittassa ekaggatam.
ps3.2:5.6: Viriyam na samadhi, samadhi na viriyam.
ps3.2:5.8: Cittance bhikkhu nissaya labhati samadhim, labhati cittassa ekaggatam.
ps3.2:5.9: Cittam na samadhi, samadhi na cittam.
ps3.2:5.11: Vimamsance bhikkhu nissaya labhati samadhim, labhati cittassa ekaggatam.
ps3.2:5.12: Vimamsa na samadhi, samadhi na vimamsa.
ps3.2:5.14: Iddhiya imani attha padani iddhilabhaya iddhipatilabhaya iddhivikubbanataya iddhivisavitaya iddhivasibhavaya iddhivesarajjaya samvattantiti.
ps3.2:6.12: Saddhaya pariggahitam cittam assaddhiye na injatiti—anenjam.
ps3.2:6.13: Viriyena pariggahitam cittam kosajje na injatiti—anenjam.
ps3.2:6.14: Satiya pariggahitam cittam pamade na injatiti—anenjam.
ps3.2:6.15: Samadhina pariggahitam cittam uddhacce na injatiti—anenjam.
ps3.2:6.16: Pannaya pariggahitam cittam avijjaya na injatiti—anenjam.
ps3.2:6.18: Iddhiya imani solasa mulani iddhilabhaya iddhipatilabhaya iddhivikubbanataya iddhivisavitaya iddhivasibhavaya iddhivesarajjaya samvattantiti.
ps3.2:7.3: ekopi hutva bahudha hoti, bahudhapi hutva eko hoti;
ps3.2:7.5: tirokuttam tiropakaram tiropabbatam asajjamano gacchati, seyyathapi akase;
ps3.2:7.8: akasepi pallankena kamati, seyyathapi pakkhi sakuno;
ps3.2:7.9: imepi candimasuriye evammahiddhike evammahanubhave panina paramasati parimajjati;
ps3.2:8.1: Idhati imissa ditthiya imissa khantiya imissa ruciya imasmim adaye imasmim dhamme imasmim vinaye imasmim dhammavinaye imasmim pavacane imasmim brahmacariye imasmim satthusasane.
ps3.2:8.4: Bhikkhuti puthujjanakalyanako va hoti bhikkhu sekho va araha va akuppadhammo.
ps3.2:8.6: Ekopi hutva bahudha hotiti pakatiya eko bahukam avajjati, satam va sahassam va satasahassam va avajjati.
ps3.2:8.10: Yathayasma culapanthako ekopi hutva bahudha hoti, evamevam so iddhima cetovasippatto ekopi hutva bahudha hoti.
ps3.2:8.11: Bahudhapi hutva eko hotiti pakatiya bahuko ekam avajjati;
ps3.2:8.15: Yathayasma culapanthako bahudhapi hutva eko hoti, evamevam so iddhima cetovasippatto bahudhapi hutva eko hoti.
ps3.2:9.1: Avibhavanti kenaci anavatam hoti appaticchannam vivatam pakatam.
ps3.2:9.2: Tirobhavanti kenaci avatam hoti paticchannam pihitam patikujjitam.
ps3.2:9.3: Tirokuttam tiropakaram tiropabbatam asajjamano gacchati, seyyathapi akaseti pakatiya akasakasinasamapattiya labhi hoti.
ps3.2:9.9: Yatha manussa pakatiya aniddhimanto kenaci anavate aparikkhitte asajjamana gacchanti, evamevam so iddhima cetovasippatto tirokuttam tiropakaram tiropabbatam asajjamano gacchati, seyyathapi akase.
ps3.2:10.1: Pathaviyapi ummujjanimujjam karoti, seyyathapi udaketi pakatiya apokasinasamapattiya labhi hoti.
ps3.2:10.7: Yatha manussa pakatiya aniddhimanto udake ummujjanimujjam karonti, evamevam so iddhima cetovasippatto pathaviya ummujjanimujjam karoti, seyyathapi udake.
ps3.2:11.1: Udakepi abhijjamane gacchati, seyyathapi pathaviyanti pakatiya pathavikasinasamapattiya labhi hoti.
ps3.2:11.7: Yatha manussa pakatiya aniddhimanto abhijjamanaya pathaviya gacchanti, evamevam so iddhima cetovasippatto abhijjamane udake gacchati, seyyathapi pathaviyam.
ps3.2:12.1: Akasepi pallankena kamati, seyyathapi pakkhi sakunoti pakatiya pathavikasinasamapattiya labhi hoti.
ps3.2:12.6: So akase antalikkhe cankamatipi titthatipi nisidatipi seyyampi kappeti.
ps3.2:12.7: Yatha manussa pakatiya aniddhimanto pathaviya cankamantipi titthantipi nisidantipi seyyampi kappenti, evamevam so iddhima cetovasippatto akase antalikkhe cankamatipi titthatipi nisidatipi seyyampi kappeti, seyyathapi pakkhi sakuno.
ps3.2:13.1: Imepi candimasuriye evammahiddhike evammahanubhave panina paramasati parimajjatiti idha so iddhima cetovasippatto nisinnako va nipannako va candimasuriye avajjati.
ps3.2:13.5: So nisinnako va nipannako va candimasuriye panina amasati paramasati parimajjati.
ps3.2:13.6: Yatha manussa pakatiya aniddhimanto kincideva rupagatam hatthapase amasanti paramasanti parimajjanti, evamevam so iddhima cetovasippatto nisinnako va nipannako va candimasuriye panina amasati paramasati parimajjati.
ps3.2:14.1: Yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vattetiti sace so iddhima cetovasippatto brahmalokam gantukamo hoti, durepi santike adhitthati—
ps3.2:14.13: Dibbena cakkhuna tassa brahmuno rupam passati.
ps3.2:14.14: Dibbaya sotadhatuya tassa brahmuno saddam sunati.
ps3.2:14.16: Sace so iddhima cetovasippatto dissamanena kayena brahmalokam gantukamo hoti, kayavasena cittam parinameti, kayavasena cittam adhitthati.
ps3.2:14.17: Kayavasena cittam parinametva, kayavasena cittam adhitthahitva, sukhasannanca lahusannanca okkamitva dissamanena kayena brahmalokam gacchati.
ps3.2:14.18: Sace so iddhima cetovasippatto adissamanena kayena brahmalokam gantukamo hoti, cittavasena kayam parinameti, cittavasena kayam adhitthati.
ps3.2:14.19: Cittavasena kayam parinametva, cittavasena kayam adhitthahitva sukhasannanca lahusannanca okkamitva adissamanena kayena brahmalokam gacchati.
ps3.2:14.20: So tassa brahmuno purato rupim abhinimminati manomayam sabbangapaccangim ahinindriyam.
ps3.2:14.21: Sace so iddhima cankamati, nimmitopi tattha cankamati.
ps3.2:14.22: Sace so iddhima titthati, nimmitopi tattha titthati.
ps3.2:14.23: Sace so iddhima nisidati, nimmitopi tattha nisidati.
ps3.2:14.24: Sace so iddhima seyyam kappeti, nimmitopi tattha seyyam kappeti.
ps3.2:14.25: Sace so iddhima dhumayati, nimmitopi tattha dhumayati.
ps3.2:14.26: Sace so iddhima pajjalati, nimmitopi tattha pajjalati.
ps3.2:14.27: Sace so iddhima dhammam bhasati, nimmitopi tattha dhammam bhasati.
ps3.2:14.28: Sace so iddhima panham pucchati, nimmitopi tattha panham pucchati.
ps3.2:14.29: Sace so iddhima panham puttho visajjeti, nimmitopi tattha panham puttho visajjeti.
ps3.2:14.30: Sace so iddhima tena brahmuna saddhim santitthati sallapati sakaccham samapajjati, nimmitopi tattha tena brahmuna saddhim santitthati sallapati sakaccham samapajjati.
ps3.2:14.31: Yannadeva so iddhima karoti, tamtadeva hi so nimmito karotiti—
ps3.2:15.2: Sikhissa bhagavato arahato sammasambuddhassa abhibhu nama savako brahmaloke thito sahassilokadhatum sarena vinnapesi.
ps3.2:15.5: dissamanenapi hetthimena upaddhakayena adissamanenapi uparimena upaddhakayena dhammam desesi.
ps3.2:15.6: Dissamanenapi uparimena upaddhakayena, adissamanenapi hetthimena upaddhakayena dhammam desesi.
ps3.2:15.7: So pakativannam vijahitva kumarakavannam va dasseti, nagavannam va dasseti, supannavannam va dasseti, yakkhavannam va dasseti, indavannam va dasseti, devavannam va dasseti, brahmavannam va dasseti, samuddavannam va dasseti, pabbatavannam va dasseti, vanavannam va dasseti, sihavannam va dasseti, byagghavannam va dasseti, dipivannam va dasseti, hatthimpi dasseti, assampi dasseti, rathampi dasseti, pattimpi dasseti, vividhampi senabyuham dassetiti—
ps3.2:16.2: Idha bhikkhu imamha kaya annam kayam abhinimminati rupim manomayam sabbangapaccangim ahinindriyam.
ps3.2:16.8: Seyyatha va pana puriso asim kosiya pavaheyya.
ps3.2:16.13: Seyyatha va pana puriso ahim karanda uddhareyya.
ps3.2:16.18: Evamevam bhikkhu imamha kaya annam kayam abhinimminati rupim manomayam sabbangapaccangim ahinindriyam.
ps3.2:17.11: Ayasmato bakulassa nanavipphara iddhi, ayasmato sankiccassa nanavipphara iddhi, ayasmato bhutapalassa nanavipphara iddhi.
ps3.2:18.8: akasanancayatanasamapattiya rupasannaya patighasannaya nanattasannaya pahanattho ijjhatiti …pe…
ps3.2:18.13: Ayasmato sariputtassa samadhivipphara iddhi, ayasmato sanjivassa samadhivipphara iddhi, ayasmato khanukondannassa samadhivipphara iddhi, uttaraya upasikaya samadhivipphara iddhi, samavatiya upasikaya samadhivipphara iddhi.
ps3.2:19.7: “patikule ca appatikule ca appatikulasanni vihareyyan”ti, appatikulasanni tattha viharati.
ps3.2:19.9: “appatikule ca patikule ca patikulasanni vihareyyan”ti, patikulasanni tattha viharati.
ps3.2:19.11: “patikule ca appatikule ca tadubhayam abhinivajjetva upekkhako vihareyyam sato sampajano”ti, upekkhako tattha viharati sato sampajano.
ps3.2:20.2: Anitthasmim vatthusmim mettaya va pharati, dhatuto va upasamharati.
ps3.2:21.2: Itthasmim vatthusmim asubhaya va pharati, aniccato va upasamharati.
ps3.2:22.1: Katham patikule ca appatikule ca appatikulasanni viharati?
ps3.2:22.2: Anitthasminca itthasminca vatthusmim mettaya va pharati, dhatuto va upasamharati.
ps3.2:22.3: Evam patikule ca appatikule ca appatikulasanni viharati.
ps3.2:23.1: Katham appatikule ca patikule ca patikulasanni viharati?
ps3.2:23.2: Itthasminca anitthasminca vatthusmim asubhaya va pharati, aniccato va upasamharati.
ps3.2:23.3: Evam appatikule ca patikule ca patikulasanni viharati.
ps3.2:24.1: Katham patikule ca appatikule ca tadubhayam abhinivajjetva upekkhako viharati sato sampajano?
ps3.2:24.2: Idha bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajano.
ps3.2:24.7: manasa dhammam vinnaya neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajano.
ps3.2:24.8: Evam patikule ca appatikule ca tadubhayam abhinivajjetva upekkhako viharati sato sampajano.
ps3.2:25.2: Sabbesam pakkhinam, sabbesam devanam, ekaccanam manussanam, ekaccanam vinipatikanam.
ps3.2:26.2: Raja cakkavatti vehasam gacchati saddhim caturanginiya senaya, antamaso assabandhagopurise upadaya.
ps3.2:26.3: Jotikassa gahapatissa punnavato iddhi, jatilassa gahapatissa punnavato iddhi, mendakassa gahapatissa punnavato iddhi, ghositassa gahapatissa punnavato iddhi, pancannam mahapunnanam punnavato iddhi.
ps3.2:27.2: Vijjadhara vijjam parijappetva vehasam gacchanti, akase antalikkhe hatthimpi dassenti, assampi dassenti, rathampi dassenti, pattimpi dassenti, vividhampi senabyuham dassenti.
ps3.2:28.8: Evam tattha tattha sammapayogapaccaya ijjhanatthena iddhi.
